physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Short stature, markedly advanced bone age, mild midface hypoplasia, flat nasal bridge, mild prognathism, no signs of sex steroid exposure.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Bone age has remained advanced approximately 4 years above chronologic age on repeat assessments.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Poor growth pattern since age 6.5 years; well-controlled type 1 diabetes mellitus; mild dysmorphic features including broad forehead and exaggerated lumbar lordosis.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Height ceased at approximately 12 years of age despite normally timed puberty.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Height close to 3 SDS until age 6.5, advanced bone age at 13 years.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Growth rate declined; GnRH agonist treatment successfully blocked bone age advancement.
